tool.name: Builds vector contour lines from a raster elevation model.

param.name: InputDSN
param.label: The input data source name
param.help: The input data source name to use.

param.name: a
param.label: Attribute name
param.help: provides a name for the attribute in which to put the elevation. If not provided no elevation attribute is attached.

param.name: b
param.label: The band number
param.help: A particular band, defaults to band 1.
